widgets_values: The Advanced STG Guider dynamically controls the diffusion model's denoising process by mapping sigma values to specific configuration parameters (CFG scale, STG scale/rescale factors, and attention layer skipping patterns), enabling precise control at different denoising stages independently of step numbers while supporting additional techniques like CFG-Zero rescaling and threshold-based noise prediction zeroing.
Presets override the values inside ðŸ…›ðŸ…£ðŸ…§ STG Guider Advanced node.
Depending on the latent upscaler model used, it can increase either spatial or temporal resolution, without moving to/from pixel space.

crop decides if the conditioning image(s) is center-cropped or resized by stretching 

crf and blur are preprocessing parameters for conditioning image(s) to make them look more like video frames, which helps with the dynamicity of the generated video

If you are not constrained in VRAM, run 1x1 tile starting from step 18 
If you are constrained in your available VRAM, run 2x2 tiles and use somewhat lower noies levels, starting from step 23.

We generate at a base resolution of 768x512.
The video will be upscaled later to FHD.

photo of B4R woman, female focus, Photorealistic close-up of the same black-haired female customer in mid-conversation, professionally lit from above. Shot from chest up in her sophisticated blouse. Behind her, a softly blurred bar interior with ambient lighting, showing hints of other tables and subtle warm lighting fixtures. Background creates depth while keeping focus on her facial expression. Captured with shallow depth of field, 8K detail, professional portrait lighting.

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
widgets_values: , In this dynamic video scene, a heavily armored warrior stands poised and ready, their imposing figure dominating the frame. The warrior's helmet, adorned with a skull emblem and wings, gleams under the ambient light, while their armor, a mix of metallic gray and gold, bears the marks of battle. The character holds a large, intricate weapon, its details sharply defined against the blurred backdrop. The atmosphere is tense and charged, with a sense of impending action. The camera moves slowly around the warrior, capturing every intricate detail of their gear and the surrounding environment, creating a cinematic experience that emphasizes both the character's strength and the intensity of the
Best use descriptive prompt, but you can even leave it empty in i2v case.

widgets_values: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted, disfigured, motion smear, motion artifacts, fused fingers, bad anatomy, weird hand, ugly, character talking,

Framerate can be adjusted, just make sure you are using the same framerate in your VideoCombine node to see proper playback.

60FPS = Lower quality, more motion
24 FPS = Higher quality, less motion
